content: this beautifully textured pumpkin pattern makes a gorgeous home decor essential for autumn/fall it features the pretty suzette stitch also called grit or thicket stitch an easy textured stitch that is both lovely to look at and creates a cozy feel finish with a cinnamon stick or twig for a touch of rustic charm the pattern is written in three sizes with **size small free on the blog** written using us crochet terminology the paid pdf includes both us and uk terminology versions in 2 files for your convenience **skill level ** easy **recommended yarn** aran or worsted #4 weight acrylic/wool/blend yarn approximately s 42-47yards/38-43m 0 8-0 9oz/22-25g m 63-71yards/58-65m 1 2-1 3oz/34-38g l 82-91yards/75-83m 1 6-1 7oz/44-49g you can use any yarn it is a great pattern for scraps you may need to adjust your hook size accordingly and size will vary with different weight yarn **hooks & other materials** us size h 5 0mm yarn needle stitch marker toy stuffing cinnamon sticks or twigs **sizes/finished measurements** not including stick approximate finished sizes circumference x height small 11 x 2 /28cm x 5cm medium 13 x 2 5 /33cm x 6cm large 15 5 x 3 /39cm x 8cm this pattern has been tested for errors but should you have any problems please send me a message through ravelry or email **the finished pumpkins are designed for decorative use only ** they are **not toys** and **finished items should be kept out of the reach of children ** **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 **copyright and selling items** the pattern and all images are copyright janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or share the pattern in full or part you may print the pdf for your own use you may not use my photographs without permission you may not make tutorial videos from this pattern you may sell finished items handmade in small quantities by you design credit is appreciated thank you **gpsr compliance and safety information** this digital crochet pattern complies with the general product safety regulations gpsr the pdfs are free from viruses at the time of upload to ravelry the pattern is written with ease of readability and printing in mind all links are to trusted verified sources **please note that instant download pdf files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
